tasks.title: Implement mobile-first CSS layout

tasks.title: Implement WHOOP charts (HRV, RHR, Sleep, Strain)
tasks.description: Create 4 Chart.js visualizations for WHOOP recovery metrics: HRV line chart with baseline band, RHR line chart, Sleep duration bar chart, and Strain bar chart.
tasks.details: Chart configs: HRV - line chart, blue (#3b82f6), baseline zone as gray band, 7 data points. RHR - line chart, red (#ef4444), lower is better indication. Sleep - bar chart, purple (#8b5cf6), target line overlay at 8 hours. Strain - bar chart, orange (#f97316), cumulative weekly shown. All charts: responsive:true, maintainAspectRatio:true, minimal legend.
